Harman's North Fork Cottages 2022 August 11 - 14

Our most recent trip included a hike at the western base of Dolly Sods where the bridge was recently condemned. You could see the holes in the bridge as you walked over it and could also see the mostly-rusted away steel beams underneath. We walked up the Red River to a shallow crossing then waded around a bit, but it wasn't deep enough for swimming.

We then drove up to the top ridge of Dolly Sods and walked the short 1/2 mile nature trail to the point over-looking the namesake sods for which the park is named.

Lodging

  • Cabin 13: David, Lisa, Jean
  • Cabin 14: Ted, Steph, John, Nancy
  • Cabin 15: Tim, Ryan, Kayla, Heather, Hung
  • Cabin 20: Scott/Allison & Isaac, Keith, Jake/Kendall & Noah, Ava
